author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Builders’ Association of India (BAI), Thanjavur Centre, celebrated the BAI Platinum Jubilee and the Builder’s Day here on Friday with speakers stressing the need to be loyal to the clients through quality and timely deliverance of projects.

BAI Thanjavur Centre Chairman R. Elancheran, celebration committee chairman S. Vaithiyanathan, secretary B. Anandhan, and treasurer R.K. Kumar spoke. The former BAI national vice-president K. Padmanabhan traced the growth of BAI Thanjavur Centre and its contributions to the welfare of the builder community. The BAI Thanjavur Centre conferred the Lifetime Achievement Award to senior and eminent industry players, including V. Deivasigamani, P.N.K. Menon, and K. Padmanabhan, K. Sethuraman, and B. Sivanandam.
title: Complete projects in time, builders told
